title: Fox Footwear Presents | A Whole New Concept | The Motion Con
description:
Introducing the Motion Concept, a groundbreaking design blending the world of modern performance training, retro-athletic inspiration, and action sports styling.

In 2007, we unveiled the Concept, a true training/lifestyle hybrid that quickly became one of our most popular styles of all time. Now the Concept is back and better than ever featuring Fox Motion technology for revolutionary levels of cushion, flexibility, and comfort.

Music:
Artist: Gramatik
Song: 23 Flavors
Album Title: #DigitalFreedom
facebook.com/gramatik

asset.author: Fox Head
